content.rendered:
Directed by Shree Narayan Singh.

Written by Medha Jadhav. Siddharth-Garima. Siddharth Singh. Garima Wahal.

Cast Anupam Kher(Dinanath Joshi (Kaka)). Akshay Kumar(Keshav). Bhumi Pednekar(Jaya). Divyendu Sharma(Naru). Sana Khan(Keshav’s Girl Friend (as Sana Khaan)). Rajesh Sharma(Mathur). Sachin Khedekar(Film Director). Ayesha Raza Mishra(Vidya (as Ayesha Raza)). Shobha Khote(Daadi). Sudhir Pandey(Pandit Vimalnath Sharma (Bauji)). Atul Srivastava(Jagdish). Akash Singh Rajput(Reporter). Vikas Pal(Hari, keshav’s friend). Musa Muhammed Olayinka(Mistari). Vijay Kumar Dogra(Shiv Shankar , Keshav’s friend). Satyen Chaturvedi(Aadhar, Keshav’s friend). Rati Shankar Tripathi(Sarpanch). Manoj Bakshi(Cop). Mukesh S. Bhatt(Rastogi (as Mukesh Bhatt)). Gunjan Malhotra(Anu). Jaspal Sharma(Dabloo,keshav’s friend). Samir Chandra(Judge). Monika Misra(Press Reporter).Khushboo Sawan. Subhasis Chakraborty(Personal Assistant). Richa Tiwari(Reporter). Komal Sachdeva(Chulni).Sapna Basoya. Kimti Anand(Pradhan). Kajal Bhadana(Reporter)

Language Hindi.

Producers Zohaib Ali. Prerna Arora. Shital Bhatia. Gayatri Gulati. Arjun N. Kapoor. Akshay Kumar. Ouch. Neeraj Pandey. Sandeep Shandilya. Hitesh Thakkar.

Production Plan C Studios. Abundantia Entertainment. Friday Filmworks.
